attributes.action: Rewards should be introduced for children who strive to be healthy and fit.
attributes.additional_details: We have a large Obesity rate here in the UK. This Petition is to get Parliament to debate the idea of introducing rewards and competitions to those who exercise regularly, join sports clubs, eat balanced diets etc. There should be prizes to encourage our young people to get fitter and stronger. This would combat our high obesity levels, and make Young People's lives more exciting.
